targets.query: from(bucket: "ruby_test") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "locks") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lock_count") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mode"] == "AccessShareLock" or r["mode"] == "ExclusiveLock" or r["mode"] == "RowExclusiveLock" or r["mode"] == "ShareLock" or r["mode"] == "ShareUpdateExclusiveLock")
